reviews.review_msg: Greg is great fun to listen to and watch during lecture and he certainly has a lot of ideas about the material. Is really helpful on assignments: gives you ideas and additional material/sources and extensions. Course can be pretty difficult though, a lot of reading and a lot of theory - would recommend for those with a background in theory already.

V. accommodating - extensions & lots of extra office hrs arnd due dates. Recommends sources for research papers, answers emails quickly. Very theatrical and fun to listen to... but is quite tangential & skirts arnd questions asked  during lec. Theory with him is fun, but expect to participate. or else class is very dry.

I second the "not for acedimicallyfaintofheart" comment. Great guy, sense of humour! butTOO much to handle for beginners. Material is dense. He's helpful and gives extensions, but expects a lot. grading scale is a bit ambiguous/inconsistent. Off topic much?
